title: Banned for 14 days for non intently feeding in one game
body: So I hopped on a game of league one time. Was getting ping throughout the whole match, even though the game before my ping was fine. ended up feeding pretty heavily due to lag and a lot of misplays. And this was only one match and i get banned? I get a lot of feeders worse than me that are just unskilled that i report that happily keep playing summoners rift, while me? I slip once and get banned? I got plat last season was gonna shoot for Diamond, but heavily demotivated... Not looking for any enlightenment, just wanna know how this system works...

replies.body: if the game thinks you intentionally feeding and you get too many reports you will get banned, maybe it could be the attitude towards your teamm8's most commonly salt is a big one swearing is another and the whole like gg all me thing can get reported im not saying you did these but these are factors that get you reported and then it stacks up and bam you done and it's easier for the tech support to say intentionally feeding
Well i go on my account and it only says you have been banned for intentionally feeding, that it. Not verbal abuse
